title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 14-2.3 - Preparation for hydrostatic test

N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 14-2.3 - Preparation for hydrostatic test

State Regulations

The owner or user shall prepare a boiler for hydrostatic
pressure test in the following manner: (a) The boiler shall be filled with water to
the stop valve. (b) The connections
of such boiler when connected with other boilers that are under steam pressure
shall be blanked off. Exception:Where double stop valves are installed in all
connecting pipes with open drains between, such connections need not be blanked
off. Notes
